org.opendaylight.controller.web

Interface IDaylightWeb

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Devices, Flows, Troubleshoot

    public interface IDaylightWeb

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getWebId()
      Returns the Id assigned to the web bundle.
      java.lang.String getWebName()
      Returns the name of the bundle.
      short getWebOrder()
      Returns the position where the bundle tab will be placed in the GUI.
      boolean isAuthorized(UserLevel userLevel)
      This method checks if the user is authorized to access the bundle.

    • Method Detail

      • getWebName

        java.lang.String getWebName()
        Returns the name of the bundle. In the GUI, this name will be displayed on the tab.
        Returns:
        Name assigned to the bundle.

      • getWebId

        java.lang.String getWebId()
        Returns the Id assigned to the web bundle.
        Returns:
        Id assigned to the web bundle.

      • getWebOrder

        short getWebOrder()
        Returns the position where the bundle tab will be placed in the GUI.
        Returns:
        Position number for the bundle tab.

      • isAuthorized

        boolean isAuthorized(UserLevel userLevel)
        This method checks if the user is authorized to access the bundle.
        Parameters:
        userLevel - user role level in the controller space.
        Returns:
        true, if user is authorized to access the bundle, else false.
